title: Kindan No Koi Wo Shiyou
alternative_title: 禁断の恋をしよう ; Kindan no Koi wo Shiyo
status: 禁断の恋をしよう ; Kindan no Koi wo Shiyo
description:
Description :
        This manga started when Hisako is saved from a drunk by a wolf. It revolves around Hisako and Yato (the wolf during the day and human in the night!) How will she react? There are two sequels to this series: Zoku - Kindan no Koi wo Shiyou and Kindan no Koi de Ikou. Extra Story: A Request to the Vampire

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5 : Vampaia Ni Onegai [A Request To The Vampire] - End
